attributes.action: Close the unnecessary construction sites during tier 4
attributes.additional_details: Those working at constructions are putting into the risk of catching / spreading covid even though they are not key workers. Every building can wait until the situation gets better
attributes.background: Eliminate the movement of people by closing construction sites.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566846
